##Basic data import

The function is called using the `moimport(file,...)`, where the mandatory argument `file` is a string specifying the path of the file to be imported.

```{r, out.width='50%',include=TRUE, fig.align='center', fig.cap='...'}
library(tempMLMOI)
figbasic <- system.file("extdata", "basic-1.png", package = "tempMLMOI")
knitr::include_graphics(figbasic)
```


```{r}
infile <- system.file("extdata", "testDatabasic.xlsx", package = "tempMLMOI")
moimport(infile)
```
